parameters.prompt: synthwave, melancholic, dreamy, nostalgic, electric piano, soft drums, reverb-heavy
parameters.lyrics: [verse] Walking through the neon haze, echoes of a yesterday, flickering like old film frames, whispering your name [chorus] We were electric in the dark, sparks that never left a mark, but the memory glows so bright, like a fading streetlight [verse] Static hums where laughter played, shadows dance but theyre not you, just the ghosts we made [chorus] We were electric in the dark, sparks that never left a mark, but the memory glows so bright, like a fading streetlight [bridge] Maybe in another time, we could rewind, but the tapes worn out tonight [outro] Neon fades to morning blue, all thats left is me and you, in the afterglow
